title: US Government Data Sources for Investigating International Connections
description: A list of US government data sources for investigating international connections, including federal contracts, US overseas loans and grants from USAID, US import refusals, international energy statistics, weapons authorizations by country, aircraft registry, EDGAR search by country, IRS tax exempt organizations â€“ international file, foreign gifts and trips by U.S. lawmakers, foreign lobbyists, removals and returns, and advanced search in Google.
